ygData.subject: Re: Research Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: as far as i know... other magic using classes dont rely on research so much... only necros need em bad.. bcos all the good spells are research only... n from
ygData.messageBody:
as far as i know... other magic using classes dont rely on research so
much... only necros need em bad.. bcos all the good spells are research
only... n from level 29... even pets needs to research... where all other
classes that got pets get to buy em... thast tbe bad thing bout necros...

as fer research i meant at level 20 (with all the points dumped in)... i
have no problems researching a level 16 spell... hehe.. my mistake for not
saying clearly...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 11:11 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Research Tips


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Hmm, so u mean with skill 20, u make lvl 16 spells with high chance of
> sucessful rate? Thou' I havent done any research yet, but I've been
> collecting runes since lvl 20, now I got 1 bags plus runes (stackable) in
> bank. I will keep them until the stage I die die need to research for
> spells. From wat I see, at lvl 30, I still can get all my travel spells
> from Felwithe, dam & shield spells from FP and Aknon. I only worry for
> those utility spells, but fortunately wiz dun have much, hehe. Oh yes, AE
> spells also, most need to research. But this kinda spells r sucide spells
> for wiz. Once cast, it's like asking all mob "come gang bang me". I
never
> cast one since lvl 5, hehe.
>
> Ziltus
>
> On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 9:47 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > what i have learnt from some experienced folks... just dump everything i
> u
> > have into research... since theres a limit ... dont think will take up
> all
> > ya points also... unless u have tons of runes to use... when im level
> 20...
> > i almost suceed in making level 16 words all the time... like u said 80%
> > lor... but if i try level 20 spells... then theres high chance i will
> > fail... although its possible that a level 16 suceed in getting level 20
> > spells... so... conclusion DUMP EVERYTHING IN
> >
> > Nic

> got
> > > all the necessary spells (as a nuker and traveller) I need, either
> buying

> > >
